column3: I should be able to
sign up with my email, password, First name, Last name and student/staff id
column4:
Eveyone should use their GUC email while signing up 
Admins and Event offices donnot sign up

column3: sign up with an email, password, company name
insert the correct role for each of Staff/ TA/ Professor after receiving their request to register and then sends a verification mail
receive a verification email after the admin verifies their role
column4:
The verification mail should contain a verification link that automatically redirects me to the login page
If I did not click on the link I shouldn't be verified, hence the login should fail

column3: create other admin/Event Office accounts including the admin name, email and password
delete other admin/Event Office accounts
login with my email and password
column4: Eveyone should use their GUC email except Companies and Vendors

column3: logout from my account successfully
view all availabe events that are coming up and all their details including the vendors that will participate (for bazaars and booths)
column4: Events are workshops, trips, bazaars, booths in platform, conferences

column3: search the events by a specific name(Professor name/Event name) or type
view a list of all users along with their details and status (active/blocked)
register for a workshop/trip using name, mail, student/staff id
view a list of my registered events
create bazaars by adding the bazaar name, start and end date and time, location, short description and registration deadline
edit any of the bazaar details entered
column4: Only if the bazar hasn't started yet

column3: create trips by adding the trip name, location, price, start and end date and time, short description, capacity, registeration deadline
edit any of the trip details
column4: Only if trip start date hasn't passed yet

column3: create workshops by adding the workshop name, location (GUC Cairo or GUC Berlin), start and end dates and times, short description, full agenda, faculty responsible (MET, IET, etc..), professor(s) participating, required budget, funding source (external or GUC), extra required resources, capacity, registeration deadline
edit any of the workshop details entered
view a list of all workshops that i created
accept and publish workshop created by a professor
reject workshop
request edits in workshop details

create conferences by adding the conference name, start and end dates and times, short description, full agenda, conference website link, required budget, source of funding (extrernal or GUC), extra required resources
column4: the conference website will contain all the conference's details. Each conference usually has a landing page so there will be no need to add ALL the info to the event on the system

column3: edit any of the conference details
delete any event
column4: if no one registered for it yet

column3: view a list of upcoming bazaars
apply to join a bazaar from the list of bazaars by filling in a form with the following details: names and emails of a max of 5 individuals attending, booth size
apply for a booth in platform by filling in a form with the following details: names and emails of a max of 5 individuals attending, duration of booth set up, location of booth setup, booth size
column4: duration can be 1 week - 4 weeks and location in platform will be selected according to a map of the platform and booth size can be 2x2 or 4x4

column3: view all upcoming bazaars or booth set ups I am participating in (accepted requests only)
view all requests for upcoming bazaars or booth set ups I want to participate in (pending or rejected)
view the details of vendor participation requests in bazaars or booths
accept /reject vendors participation requests
view all the courts on campus (basketball/tennis/football) and their availability dates and times
view the gym schedule for each month's sessions (e.g. yoga, pilates, aerobics, Zumba, cross circuit, kick-boxing)
create a gym session with the following details: date, time, duration, type (e.g. yoga, pilates, aerobics, Zumba, cross circuit, kick-boxing), max number of participants
